Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red pottery jar, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior referring to oil (?) for cooking on a fire (?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389866) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389866)
